definition: to sprout (leaves, buds, a beard etc)

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: The trees in the park are all leaving out now.
sentences.chinese: 现在公园里的树都长出叶子了。

sentences.english: Snakes cast off and renew their skins.
sentences.chinese: 蛇脱了皮，又再长出皮来。

sentences.english: Next day the blood-quills had sprouted the tips of feathers.
sentences.chinese: 第四天，他们的血羽上已经长出羽毛尖。

sentences.english: That cloud looks like the fat I put on during the cruise.
sentences.chinese: 那片云象我在出巡游期间长出的肥肉。

sentences.english: But as their bodies have grown, they have developed tiny saw-like teeth.
sentences.chinese: 但是随着寄生蜂幼虫的成长，他们已经长出小锯齿。

sentences.english: This meant the wing did not have a ring finger.
sentences.chinese: 这揭示了为什么翼部没有长出无名指。

sentences.english: They are expected to help her grow healthy bone marrow.
sentences.chinese: 医生预计，这些肝细胞可以帮助她长出健康的骨髓。

sentences.english: A good many more buds grew on the righthand side of the split surface than on the left.
sentences.chinese: 被劈开的表面上从右边长出的幼芽比左边多得多。

sentences.english: It stood hardy and strong, and occasionally sprung a tender new leaf.
sentences.chinese: 它勇敢而坚强地挺立着，时而长出一片新的嫩叶。

sentences.english: Later it grew the big and tall leaves.
sentences.chinese: 后来铁树长出了长长的绿叶。

sentences.english: The scorching sun peeled her skin and freckled her face.
sentences.chinese: 拜烈日之赐，脱了好几层皮，也长出一脸雀斑。

sentences.english: The rosebush is putting out new shoots.
When my bone son hale grow wings, I began to learn to rush you retorted.
sentences.chinese: 当我的骨子硬朗长出羽翼，我开始学会冲您反唇相讥。

sentences.english: The trees on the hill are just leafing out.
The elm trees before Court Leys were beginning to burst into leaf.
sentences.chinese: 莱伊府第房子前面的榆树开始长出嫩叶。

sentences.english: So I think there's a lot green out in the trees now.
sentences.chinese: 所以我想现在树上要长出很多新绿来了。

definition: to be covered with/to be filled with
fur/down (soft fur)/villi capillary (in the small intestine)
to give birth/to grow (whiskers etc)/to generate/to produce
